title: Watch out: The Meta Quest Pro might not be the VR headset of your dreams
description: The Meta Quest Pro is now in people's hands and they're already disappointed – it's not the best VR headset for everyone.

title: Netflix announces The Witcher season 4, but Henry Cavill won't be back
description: We'll be getting more adventures from the Continent beyond 2023, but the main star of the show has called it a day.

title: We may have our first look at the Google Pixel Tablet software

title: How to buy the right gaming laptop this Black Friday without breaking the bank
description: Gaming laptops can be expensive, but Black Friday is a great time to find them packed with premium features for some very compelling prices.
